LanguageData.ARA_CreepPlant.label: Creep Flower
LanguageData.ARA_CreepPlant.description: A peculiar plant that can only grow on Arachnae Creep. It thrives through the creep's nutrient network with almost no fertility cost and serves as one of the swarm's food sources.
LanguageData.ARA_AcidlingTrapPlant.label: Acidling Nest Flower
LanguageData.ARA_AcidlingTrapPlant.description: A fungus hybrid cultivated by the Arachnae Swarm. It draws nutrients from the creep and undergoes a metamorphosis upon reaching a certain growth stage, ultimately transforming into an Arachnae Acidling Cocoonâ€”a special trap that releases suicidal drones against nearby enemies.
